item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Alexandre Dumas
item.description: "......When one loves, one is only too ready to believe one's love returned." -- Alexandre Dumas

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "Maybe ever’body in the whole damn world is scared of each other." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "What you're supposed to do when you don't like a thing is change it. If you can't change it, change the way you think about it. Don't complain." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "When someone shows you who they are believe them; the first time." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "We delight in the beauty of the butterfly, but rarely admit the changes it has gone through to achieve that beauty." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by maya angelou
item.description: "I love to see a young girl go out and grab the world by the lapels. Life's a bitch. You've got to go out and kick ass." -- maya angelou

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "I've learned that you can tell a lot about a person by the way (s)he handles these three things: a rainy day, lost luggage, and tangled Christmas tree lights." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Have enough courage to trust love one more time and always one more time." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "You can only become truly accomplished at something you love. Don’t make money your goal. Instead pursue the things you love doing and then do them so well that people can’t take their eyes off of you." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Ask for what you want and be prepared to get it!" -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Never make someone a priority when all you are to them is an option." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "If I am not good to myself, how can I expect anyone else to be good to me?" -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "You alone are enough. You have nothing to prove to anybody." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated. In fact, it may be necessary to encounter the defeats, so you can know who you are, what you can rise from, how you can still come out of it." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Any book that helps a child to form a habit of reading, to make reading one of his deep and continuing needs, is good for him." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Animlgrl add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "Learn from the mistakes of others. You can’t live long enough to make them all yourself. " -- Eleanor Roosevelt
